metadata.feature_description: Like and unlike wiki articles with like count display

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Navigate to Wiki Article Detail View

steps.actual: Successfully logged in as SuperUser Account

steps.expected: Wiki module page loads with article list
steps.actual: Wiki Test page loaded successfully showing 6 articles

steps.action: Click on article link (Test Article Draft)
steps.expected: Article detail page loads showing article content and like button
steps.actual: 404 Error Page displayed - 'Sorry, the page you are looking for cannot be found'

issues: Wiki article friendly URLs return 404 errors - URL rewriting not configured for wiki article detail pages
URLs like /en-us/Wiki-Test/Test-Article-Draft are not being handled by the URL rewriter
The like button is only accessible on the article detail view (Article.ascx), which cannot be accessed

steps.action: Attempt to access article detail page to view like button
steps.expected: Article detail page loads with like button visible
steps.actual: Cannot access article detail page - 404 error on all article URLs

issues: Cannot test like functionality - article detail pages are inaccessible due to 404 errors

steps.action: Attempt to access article detail page to view unlike button
steps.expected: Article detail page loads with unlike button visible (after liking)
steps.actual: Cannot access article detail page - 404 error on all article URLs

issues: Cannot test unlike functionality - article detail pages are inaccessible due to 404 errors

steps.action: Attempt to access article detail page to view like count
steps.expected: Article detail page loads showing like count
steps.actual: Cannot access article detail page - 404 error on all article URLs

issues: Cannot test like count display - article detail pages are inaccessible due to 404 errors

observations: Code review confirms like functionality exists in Article.ascx (lines 28, 33-38, 115, 196) with proper Knockout.js bindings
Like button uses CSS classes dnnSocialLike/dnnSocialLikeActive and binds to like/unlike functions
Like count is displayed via model.likeString().Big binding in the article detail view
The socialController.like() and socialController.unlike() functions are properly implemented in dnn.wiki.Article.js
The like button only appears when ArticleApproved is true (Article.ascx line 24)
Wiki article URLs use friendly URL format (/Wiki-Test/Article-Name) but the URL rewriting is not configured
The actual URL should use query parameters like ?cid=<contentItemId> according to Links.cs (line 33)
All wiki articles exist (6 articles found on Wiki Test page) but their detail pages are inaccessible
